key_risks: Exposure to catastrophic events such as hurricanes, tornadoes, and floods
Regulatory and compliance risks due to heavy industry regulation
Market volatility and investment risks from reliance on fixed-income securities and equities
Dependence on independent agents for customer acquisition and retention
Ethical and social concerns due to unresolved customer complaints
controversies: Pretax catastrophe losses of approximately $141 million in Q4 2022
Mixed reviews and complaints from customers, with 9 unresolved complaints as of December 2023
environmental_issues: Exposure to catastrophic events and reliance on reinsurance
social_issues: Mixed customer feedback and unresolved complaints
